alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 5:40PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Idaho County through 530 PM PDT... At 440 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 33 miles east of Riggins, or 39 miles southeast of Grangeville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dixie and Orogrande. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
